import React, { useState, useContext } from "react" import { AuthContext } from "../Context/ContextProvider" function Account() { const context = useContext(AuthContext) const { login, loginUser } = context console.log(loginUser) const [request, setRequest] = useState(false) const [payment, setPayment] = useState(false) return ( login ?
loginUser

payment

) } export default Account
